title: Veteran Iranian actress Shahla Riahi dies at 92

sources.title: Veteran Iranian actress Shahla Riahi dies at 92
sources.description: Veteran Iranian actress Shahla Riahi dies at 92 Tehran Times, Culture January 1, 2020 Actress Shahla Riahi, who was also Iran’s first female filmmaker, dies at 93. TEHRAN – Actress Shahla Riahi, who presented herself as Iran’s first female director in 1957 by making “Marjan”, died of Alzheimer’s in Tehran on Tuesday. She was 93.
